name: silex
description: Silex is a self-hosted website builder and CMS that runs entirely in the browser. Users can visually design responsive websites with drag-and-drop elements and publish static sites easily.
features: Visual website builder: Creates websites with drag-and-drop elements without coding.
Responsive design: Automatically adapts layouts for desktop, tablet, and mobile screens.
Component library: Provides pre-built components like headers, galleries, and forms.
Static site export: Generates clean HTML/CSS/JS files for hosting anywhere.
Template system: Starts projects from customizable templates for faster development.
Custom CSS: Adds custom styling with CSS editor for advanced customization.
Image management: Uploads and manages images with built-in media library.
SEO tools: Configures meta tags, titles, and descriptions for search optimization.
Version control: Saves project versions for rollback and experimentation.
Multi-page sites: Creates and manages multiple pages with navigation menus.
Form builder: Designs contact forms with customizable fields and validation.
Publishing options: Publishes to FTP, GitHub Pages, or other hosting services.
